endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of registered patients with summary details.
Fetch consolidated health records for a specific patient by their ID.
Add a new patient's information to the system database.
Update patient details for a specific patient.
Remove a patient's information from the system.
Retrieve a list of associated healthcare providers and their details.
Fetch details including available services for a specific health care provider.
Add new health records for a designated patient.
Generate a summary report of system activity and health statistics.
Review the service's compliance status with data protection regulations.
